about_the_game:
To ensure a better translation quality and to vividly depict the new story, the English version of "Will of the Stars" will be released in January 2024.
Stay tuned!

Stars Will is the second free DLC of Lightracer: Spark, where you will travel to the frontline of cosmic warfare, witnessing the decline and rebirth of a stellar civilization. You will make crucial decisions that determine the fate of all beings in the universe.

Nirvana Rebirth

The glorious era has fleeted.
The once spacefaring intelligent species now struggles to survive beneath the ice cover.
You will explore the history and future of the Glass eel civilization and guide them step by step from decline to prosperity.

Avatar System & War System Rework

After a period of testing, Avatar System and War System in the BETA version's rework will be officially integrated into the game with the launch of "Will of the Stars." You can choose to start again from the prologue, experiencing all the stories and game content anew, or continuing the previous save files.

Galactic Perspective & Stellar-scale Projects

Stars Will story takes place on four planets and a neutron star. You will construct stellar-scale projects enveloping the stars, transform them into weapons, to devastatingly blow your enemies across the cosmos at speeds surpassing light.

Deciding the Fate of All Beings

In Stars Will, you must make a crucial choice, deciding either to remain aligned with your original faction or join forces with them to change the fundamental rules of the universe. Please note that the choices made during the dawn of Qiuyuan and Gruegreen will impact the outcome of this story.
